sections.heading: Short title.  This Act may be cited as the Law Enforcement Officer Bulletproof Vest Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Law Enforcement Officer Bulletproof Vest Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Law enforcement agencies to provide bulletproof vests for officers.
sections.text: Law enforcement agencies to provide bulletproof vests for officers.

sections.heading: Applicability. If substantial funding for the purchase of bulletproof vests is provided
sections.text:
to law enforcement agencies by the federal government and State government, the law
enforcement agency shall comply with the provisions of this Act. This Act does not apply to a
law enforcement agency if any one of the following is applicable:
